name: 2023 The 5th International Conference on Smart Grid Technologies
content: Publication: The accepted (Registered & Presented) full papers will be collected in International Journal of Smart Grid and Clean Energy (IJSGCE). ISSN: 2315-4462 (Print) ISSN: 2373-3594 (Online) DOI: 10.12720/sgce Indexed by: CNKI, Google Scholar, EI Inspec, Crossref, etc.
